activities: MailRoute receives personal information from EU and Switzerland via information submitted by customers and potential customers via our website and through the services we provide over the internet.  This information is used to deliver our services, support our customers, process payments and handle orders, communicate with customers about orders, services, current and future products and features, update our records, display customized and/or localized content on our website, and to allow our customers to manage the features of our services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online data collected through customer sign-up, or as may be collected only by MailRoute's customers, and placed on MailRoute's platform.  MailRoute does not process data manually.
